Text:
great album

still looking for a decent copy of Philip Japs album, the one i have has "windows sound effects"

This is one of my favorite of torrents that you have created. I really appreciate your sharing Bazooka Joe - I've tried to find any information on the band that I could but always turn up with nothing. This is the first and last place I have heard of this phenominal band and I hope more people download it.
I have a great track from that band called Drive (12" Mix) which is not on that album. Meanwhile, it would be nice if someone could seed and I will take over to keep this torrent alive. Thanx
